extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

clusters.name: Laundry Washer Mode
clusters.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster and defines additional mode tags and namespaced enumerated values for laundry washer as well as laundry dryer devices.

attributes.name: SupportedModes
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL contain the list of supported modes that may be selected for the CurrentMode attribute.

attributes.name: CurrentMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the current mode of the server.

attributes.name: StartUpMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the desired startup mode for the server when it is supplied with power.

attributes.name: OnMode
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate whether the value of CurrentMode depends on the state of the On/Off cluster on the same endpoint.

parameters.description: On receipt of this command, if the NewMode field indicates a valid mode transition within the supported list, the server SHALL set the CurrentMode attribute to the NewMode value.
